column2: shame,"In my 20s - and was going out to dinner to celebrate a friend's birthday. Her (older - in 30s) cousin, really wanted me to get drunk cos I'd visited their (cousin & wife) place quite a bit, but had always been very careful - brought up to believe in moderation
column3: in drink (but not guilt repression etc). I mixed drinking with smoking (which
column5: did) and got drunk and had to leave

column2: guilt,"When I noticed that my little sister was sulking, because I could not meet her because of a misunderstanding."
disgust,"I got disgusted with a man who was beating a woman in the street. I just happened to be there but I was abhorred by the rudness."
joy,When I passed the driving test (on the second try).

sadness,"I partly colored my hair black. My mother didn't like it and reproached me to be a ""subversive element"". Later on she stated that this was due to my friends. As I see it, this all resulted from colouring my hair."
disgust,I greeted a friend and he did not respond.
anger,"An argument among friends in which my opinions on the way to spend spare time were disapproved."
shame,Caused fault in V.C.R. by not following instructions carefully.
joy,"My girlfriend gave me some feed-back and I understood that it meant that our relationship was about to turn even closer."

fear,"I was a passenger in a jumbo-jet which was accelerating down the runway and almost at the point of take-off, when the pilot suddenly braked and put the engines into reverse thrust, in an obviously urgent attempt to stop the aircraft. The hostesses show signs of
column3: concern and my first thought was that something was on the runway in our path
column5: we were in danger of hitting it."

column2: disgust,NO RESPONSE.
sadness,I was very sad when my first boyfriend finished our relationship.
sadness,When my friend (girl) went abroad for two years.
disgust,"When I learnt that my offer to study at the university had been withdrawn  and so I would not get hostel accomodation at UNZA, even though I registered as a student later."
sadness,"I was very sad when I could not take the M.A (I) exams due to illness, and a relative of mine disheartened me about it."
guilt,"When I stole money from my mother and she asked me later if I was responsible.  I never admitted it."
anger,"At an unjust, or to be more precise, at a bureaucratic treatment of one's personality."
anger,I had a quarrel with my parents; I was convinced to be right.
shame,"I made an unkind remark about the ethnicity of some friends without realizing it."
disgust,Can't remember any such feelings now.

shame,"I was supposed to go out with my girlfriend one Saturday night, but I got really drunk with some friends earlier that afternoon and evening. So, I totally forgot about going out with my girlfriend. She showed up the next day, and that was when I remembered."
shame,"A patient, to whom I had given a powerful medicine, shouted at me in front of many people.  I realized that he did so because he was very ill."
fear,Having a car accident.
shame,"When I found a letter addressed ""To Mum"" by my son, 6 months later, he begged me not to sell his new shoes which he messed up after wearing them for the first time."
sadness,"When my parents separated temporarily and I was left behind with my father.  As I loved my mother I wanted to go with her."
disgust,"When I saw a drunk man urinate upon himsellf and he seemed to be thoroughly content with it."
shame,"The first time I slept at my boyfriends house and had to walk down the hall to the shower in front of his housemates. I felt they were judging me."
joy,"My joy knew no bounds when I was selected for a job even before having finished my studies."
sadness,"When I learned that a friend of mine had not been speaking to her boyfriend for a week after an argument because of unfounded jealousy."
shame,Not doing well in examns which I should do well (English examns).
disgust,A boy in my class talking too loud in the lecture.
fear,"One day before Christmas, I went shopping with my brother and his friend. We had a good time. But on the way home we were almost in an accident because the weather was bad."
